modName: New combat music-Two steps from Hell
summary: Replaces the combat tracks with music from \"Two steps from Hell\"
descriptionHtml:
Replaces the combat tracks with music from \"Two steps from Hell\" to change up the feel of normal combat and make dragon fights faster paced and epic.
Tracks
 Normal combat:
>The last stand
>Unexplained forces
>He who brings the night
 >What\'s happening to me

Dragon battle:   
>Strength of a Thousand Men
>Titan Dune
>Army of Justice
author: vatreyez
